AI & Robotics Ventures 

(ARV)

ARV is the technology development and venture building spin-off from PTTEP. 
We innovate,develop and bring cutting-edge AI & Robotics technologies to solvecomplex challenges spanning air, land, and sea applications. Together with ourpartners, and leveraging our Innovation Platform, we scale our innovations into new high impact businesses.
ARV is a venture building arm of PTTEP to innovate and develop new technologies for scale up as new S-Curves. Our ARV Innovation Platform, with our partners, has created AI & Robotics solutions covering air, land, and sea applications

THE FUTURE

ARV NOW

WHAT WE DO

TECHNOLOGY DEVELOPMENT

As we are the technology spin-off company dedicated to leverage cutting-edge AI & Robotics technology, the technology development is one of our core company strategies.

Professional Services

ARV provides professional services and solutions for Oil & Gas and non-Oil & Gas business including facility inspection using our AI and Robotics technology across air/sea/land applications and through our business units.

THE FUTURE

ARV NOW.

Business Building

ARV innovates and develops new business S-Curves in our Venture Studio team.

INNOVATION PLATFORM

Through ARV network of clients and partners, we have resources to accelerate and invest in high potential start-ups to meet market demands. ARV’s headquarter is home to a shared workspace, facilities infrastructure, and access to network & playground for our partners.
